mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (list_id, assignee_id, title, description, order_index, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) VALUES (#{listId}, #{assigneeId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{orderIndex}, NOW(), NOW(), NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.list_id AS listId, c.title, c.description, c.order_index AS orderIndex, c.due_date AS dueDate, c.assignee_id AS assigneeId, u.nickname As assigneeName, u.profile_img As assigneeProfileImg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment cm WHERE cm.card_id = c.id AND cm.deleted_at IS NULL) AS commentCount FROM card c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.assignee_id = u.id WHERE c.list_id = #{listId} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.order_index ASC
SELECT * FROM card WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
